Description.Name: Sniper Artillery Piece
Description.Details: The Sniper Rifle Artillery Piece is second most powerful tube artillery, capable of crippling or destroying most light and medium BattleMechs with a single hit. As with all artillery types, the Sniper always fires indirectly and deals damage in the area of impact. The artillery piece is integrated into the right arm and torso of the Helepolis and cannot be removed or destroyed.
